synonyms.synonym: Elongation factor Tu GTP-binding domain-containing protein 2

protein.specific_function: Component of the U5 snRNP complex required for pre-mRNA splicing

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides
